function.name: extract_vacuum_features
function.description: Extract vacuum cleaner specifications from Google search results.

capacity.description: Combined string: TOTAL_POWER/SUCTION_POWER/DUST_CAPACITY_IN_LITERS. Missing parts must be empty strings.

type.description: The physical form/type of the vacuum cleaner.

technology.description: Specifies whether the vacuum has a dust bag or is bagless.

smart.description: SMART only for Robot vacuums; NOT-SMART for all others unless the word smart (هوشمند) is mentioned.
